name: Pony City - Girls pet unicorn evolution games
name_original: Pony City - Girls pet unicorn evolution games
description: Pony City is a game for pony lovers where you can discover the awesome world of beautiful ponies and unicorns. Build your own village with friendly and colorful ponies, buy new houses, invite new villagers to grow food for the ponies and feed them to evolve. Buy different habitats for different types of ponies. You can also crossbreed to get more exciting ponies. Decorate your village with wide range of decors which makes your village unique and more beautiful. Fight and destroy bad ponies with magical power to save your village. Share your own magical world of ponies with your friends and help each other with gifts.
